name: General Chemistry
description: An introduction to the fundamentals of chemistry, including atomic structure, elements, equations, and periodic table.

name: Organic Chemistry
description: An introduction to the fundamentals of organic chemistry, including hydrocarbons, functional groups, and reactions.

name: Inorganic Chemistry
description: An introduction to the fundamentals of inorganic chemistry, including bonding, chemical reactions, and types of compounds.

name: Advanced Inorganic Chemistry
description: An advanced course in inorganic chemistry, including more complex compounds, reactions, and theories.
